title: Dear Riot Music Team
body: Can we please have a list of the songs used during the MSI 2016 event and download links?  It's so good.

replies.body:
Hi Newcents,

If you're looking for the opening ceremony music and the regional anthems, you can find them [here ](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/music-2016-mid-season-invitational)and on our [soundcloud](http://www.soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends) page.
